name: Stick Ninja (itch)
description:
Learn to be a ninja by deflecting stuff, and slowing down time with your fancy ninja focus!

Move with WASD or arrow keys. Click to punch, space to "focus"
Punch things for more points. Don't die!

This game was made in 48 hours as part of Ludum Dare 31 (December 5th-8th, 2014). The theme was "Entire Game on One Screen".
